titles.title: Belt and Road Oversight Act
Belt and Road Oversight Act
A bill to establish the position of Country China Officer to monitor and counter financing projects around the world that are backed by the People's Republic of China.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Belt and Road Oversight Act
This bill establishes Country China Officers in U.S. embassies and diplomatic posts to monitor and report on certain Chinese activities, such as China's Belt and Road Initiative projects, in their countries of responsibility. The bill also requires the Department of State to prepare annual comprehensive reviews on such activities.
